name: You Die In The Desert
description:
You Die In The Desert

Arrow keys to move
x for interactions
p to pause

You have crashed your plane in the desert and must find your way to safety before you run out of water. Inspired by the works of Antoine de Saint-Exupéry.

This game is very much a WIP and there are still a raft of things I want to add but I am not sure if I will get around to it. A lot of it is randomly generated and is different each time you play. There are currently two ways to win but depending on the random generation these can be next to impossible or very straightforward. This was all based on an idea I had that I have simplified to fit into PICO-8 but in the end I'm not sure about it so I don't know if I'll be expanding on it.
